transformed_data.unit_conversion_notes: Financial figures were extracted from various tables and paragraphs. Numbers from detailed financial statements (Documents 3, 4, 5, 6, 8-19) were multiplied by 1,000 as they appeared to be presented in thousands of MNT relative to the bond principal's magnitude (1,000,000,000 MNT). Numbers from summary tables labeled 'сая төгрөгөөр' or 'сая төгрөг' (Documents 3, 7) were multiplied by 1,000,000,000 as the presented values (tens/hundreds) needed to be scaled to the billion-level principal, overriding the 'million' label. Explicitly stated 'тэрбум төгрөг' values (Document 1) were used as is. Where multiple sources provided slightly different values for the same period and item, values from detailed statements or explicitly stated billion figures were prioritized.

time_series_map.analysis_message: Found 2 annual period(s) forming the backbone and anchor data for 1 year(s).
